javadoc: The MnemonicFieldLocation class contains specific location information within the MNEMONIC field of a CodeUnitLocation object.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: addr
params.comment: address of the location; should not be null

params.name: componentPath
params.comment:
array of indexes for each nested data component; the
            index is the data component's index within its parent; may be
            null

params.name: charOffset
params.comment:
the character position within the mnemonic string for
            this location.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: addr
params.comment: address of the location; should not be null

params.name: refAddr
params.comment:
the "referred to" address if the location is over a
            reference; may be null

params.name: componentPath
params.comment:
array of indexes for each nested data component; the
            index is the data component's index within its parent; may be
            null

params.name: charOffset
params.comment:
the character position within the mnemonic string for
            this location.

methods.javadoc:
Default constructor needed for restoring a mnemonic field location from
 XML.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Default constructor needed for restoring a mnemonic field location from
 XML.

methods.javadoc: Returns the mnemonic string at this location.
methods.name: getMnemonic
methods.comment: Returns the mnemonic string at this location.

methods.javadoc: Returns a String representation of this location.
methods.name: toString
methods.comment: Returns a String representation of this location.

name: MnemonicFieldLocation
comment:
The MnemonicFieldLocation class contains specific location
 information within the MNEMONIC field of a CodeUnitLocation object.
